english.segment1: Break down the walls. Let love prevail. Pour out Your truth. Teach us Your ways oh God. Teach us Your ways oh God. All Your sons and daughters reaching out
english.segment2: [Chorus:]. Let us rise, Let us rise. Make us one, we cry. Let us love like You love, let us rise. Every tongue, every tribe. Every heart unified, let us rise.
english.segment3: Humbly we stand. Longing for change. Bring us to You. Show us Your heart oh God. Show us Your heart oh God. All your sons and daughters reaching out
english.segment5: Let us rise unto the nations. With the story of a Savior. Who has come to bring His children home. Let us sing across the waters. With a voice in one accord. We are Yours, we are Yours, we are Yours.
